chapter.title: Logging in
chapter.para: When you log in, changes occur both in the buttons above and in the folders below.
In order to log in to the Tamboti framework, use the username and password you use to access the Cluster IT resources.
When you click on the "Login" sign in the upper right corner, a pop-up window will appear. Enter your username in the following format.
As password, enter the password you use to access IT Cluster resources. Your password is not stored in the database, but sent to the Heidelberg University Active Directory to be authenticated.

After logging in, you will see that the username you are logged in under in the upper right corner, with an option to log out again. Please note that you are automatically logged out after ?? minutes of inactivity.
